t: Out*pn of the depths I cry to you, Lord;*s
Lord,*ld hear my voice. Let*ln your ears be attentive to*ld my cry for mercy.
If*pn you, Lord,*s kept a record of sins, Lord,*ld who could stand?
But*ln with you there is forgiveness, so*ld that we can, with reverence, serve you.
I*pn wait for the Lord,*s my whole being waits, and*ld in his word I put my hope.
I*ln wait for the Lord more*ld than watchmen wait for the morning, more*ld than watchmen wait for the morning.
Israel,*pn put your hope in the Lord,*s for*ld with the Lord*s is unfailing love and*ld with him is full redemption.
He*ln himself will redeem Israel from*ld all their sins.
